name: Phoenix Fighters
overview: Game concept & design by Robert Norberg and Fredrik Sandström. Main coding by Robert Norberg; additional coding by Mattias Sandgren. Graphics by Petri Heikkinen; additional gfx by Robert Norberg; level design by Robert Norberg, Fredrik Sandström and Arto & Petri Heikkinen. Music by Magnus Andersson. Game includes a level editor that enables players to modify existing levels/missions or design their own 1- and 2-player missions. A gravity game and shooter where you can choose between one and two player missions, races and two player dog fights. In two player missions you must cooperate with whoever you're playing with.
